articles.description: Group winners will be drawn at home against a runner-up from another group. In order to achieve this, each draw is split into two sections as detailed below.

articles.title: Giovanni van Bronckhorst seemed to hand in ‘Resignation Letter’ at Rangers with decision – Keith Jackson - Ibrox News
articles.description: Rangers may have been victorious at home to Hearts on Wednesday (9 November) but they still haven't emerged from the game with much credit.
articles.content:
Rangers may have been victorious at home to Hearts on Wednesday (9 November) but they still havent emerged from the game with much credit.
